name: Land, Captain Ahoy!
description:
Captain Ahoy is abandoning ship!

You have to aim the cannon, flap through the air and adjust the landing, all to get Captain Ahoy to safety!

True pirates go for 100 points and the rank of Ocean Conquerer!

Controls:

SPACE does it all! Mash it like a salty seadog!

Escape quits the game on the Title Screen

F toggles fullscreen on the Title Screen

Credits:

Made by These Two Dudes for Create Jam Spring 2023, under the theme of Seven Seas, and the challenge "Land, Ahoy!"
